text: today on x cast law enforcement
officials identified the suspect and the
victims in Sunday's shooting at a Sikh
temple in Wisconsin this is michael
schwartz for the new york times
authorities identified the gunman as
Michael Wade page a 40 year old military
veteran who served in the Army from 1992
to 1998 page was killed in a shootout
with police in the parking lot of the
Sikh temple of Wisconsin on Sunday the
Southern Poverty Law Center says it has
been tracking mr. page for 10 years and
described him as quote a frustrated
neo-nazi they also said that page played
guitar and sang vocals in a band called
end apathy ranjit singh 49 years old
male in a press conference on Monday
police officials also identified the six
victims who were killed in the shooting
they range in age from 39 to 84 years
old and were all congregants at the Sikh
temple in the town of Oak Creek where
the shooting occurred police have
classified the shooting as an act of
domestic terrorism and the bloodshed has
shattered the sense of security among
Sikhs in the Milwaukee region and beyond
officials said that there would be a
vigil at a community center in Oak Creek
on Monday evening many say they have
noticed rising hostility toward seeks
following the September 11th attacks
some say they fear they're being
targeted as Muslims particularly the men
who tend to wear their beards long but
few said they thought such violence was
possible in their community and in
